Html:
Hi Yves,
     Your IEEE package is awesome.  However, I am having an issue when converting from word 2007 to pdf. I only have 40 references and I am pretty sure that it is the IEEE style that causes adobe professional to crash. I am using Adobe Acrobat professional 8.0 to convert the word files to pdf. I was wondering if there is an update regarding this issue or if the conversion process to pdf works fine with more recent versions of Adobe.
Thanks a lot.
